Contact Us

If you have any questions about the PACE in the Classroom project or want to learn more about how to use our resources, please contact us:

  • Email: info@paceintheclassroom.org

Feedback Form

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I use the PACE in the Classroom materials in my class?

Our materials are designed for easy integration into the curriculum. You can use lesson plans, interactive activities, and resources available on our website. If you need additional assistance, feel free to contact us.

Can I access raw PACE data for research projects?

Yes, raw PACE data will be available through the official NASA website after the satellite launch. We provide processed and interpreted data suitable for educational purposes.

Do you conduct training workshops for teachers?

Yes, we regularly conduct online and offline workshops for teachers. Stay updated on our website or subscribe to our newsletter to receive information about upcoming events.

About the project

PACE in the Classroom is an educational resource about the PACE satellite mission and the study of Earth's ecology.
